function NPC_620001:Init(NPCID) -- 1: 머리 -- 2: 꼬리 NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, 2)
local MaxHP = NPC_620001.MaxHP NPC_620001.LimitForBreakTail = MaxHP/10 NPC_620001.LimitForPain = MaxHP/20
NPC_620001.TalIdPain1 = 262000109 NPC_620001.TalIdPain2 = 262000110 NPC_620001.TalIdThreat = 262000123
NPC_620001.MinionId = 107046 end
function NPC_620001:OnFinishAndAggroNear( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) local Target = ThisNPC:Aggro( "near", 0 ) end
function NPC_620001:OnBPartRecover() for i=1, 2 do this:SetUserData( i, 0) end -- for end
function NPC_620001:AccDamage(bHead, dHitInfo) local victim = AsNPC( dHitInfo.Victim ) local attacker = dHitInfo.Attacker local totalDamage = 0 local currentDamage = 0 local currentTalent = victim:GetCurrentTalent() local userDataIdx = 1
if(bHead == false and (victim:CheckBPart(1) == true and victim:CheckBPart(2) == true and victim:CheckBPart(3) == true)) then return dHitInfo end
--[[ 꼬리쪽은 SLASH와 PIERCE가 아니면 누적 데미지에 패널티를 받는다. 머리쪽은 BLUNT가 아니면 누적데미지에 패널티를 받는다. 누적데미지는 파츠 파괴나 Pain패턴에 영향을 준다. --]]
if(bHead == false) then userDataIdx = 2
if(dHitInfo.Type == DA_SLASH or dHitInfo.Type == DA_PIERCE) then currentDamage = dHitInfo.Damage else currentDamage = dHitInfo.Damage * 0.2 end else if(dHitInfo.Type == DA_BLUNT) then currentDamage = dHitInfo.Damage else currentDamage = dHitInfo.Damage * 0.8 end end
if currentDamage == 0 then return dHitInfo end
totalDamage = victim:GetUserData(userDataIdx) + currentDamage victim:SetUserData(userDataIdx, totalDamage)
-- GLog( "T:" .. totalDamage .. "\n" ) if bHead == true and totalDamage > NPC_620001.LimitForPain then -- _LogHitInfo( dHitInfo ) local bPain = 0
if ChkMFForHitReaction( dHitInfo ) then if not victim:IsCooldown( NPC_620001.TalIdPain1 ) then victim:ClearJob() victim:UseTalentSelf( NPC_620001.TalIdPain1 ) victim:SetUserData(userDataIdx, 0) end end end
local bPartId = 0
if bHead == false and totalDamage > NPC_620001.LimitForBreakTail then if(victim:CheckBPart(1) == false) then bPartId = 1 elseif(victim:CheckBPart(2) == false) then bPartId = 2 --[[ elseif(victim:CheckBPart(3) == false) then bPartId = 3 --]] end
if( bPartId > 0 ) then victim:ClearJob() victim:BreakPart(bPartId, attacker) victim:UseTalentSelf( NPC_620001.TalIdPain2 ) victim:SetUserData(userDataIdx, 0) end end
return dHitInfo end
-- 머리 히트 function NPC_620001:OnHitCapsule_1_0( HitInfo ) return NPC_620001:AccDamage( true, HitInfo ) end
-- 머리 히트 function NPC_620001:OnHitCapsule_2_0( HitInfo ) return NPC_620001:AccDamage( true, HitInfo ) end
-- 꼬리 히트 function NPC_620001:OnHitCapsule_2_2( HitInfo ) return NPC_620001:AccDamage( false, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_620001:OnFinishSummonWolves( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor )
NPC_620001:SummonWolves( ThisNPC, Enemy, 3 ) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_620001.TalIdThreat ) end
-- 플릿풋의 아군 부르기 function NPC_620001:SummonWolves( ThisNPC, Enemy, MinionCount ) local WorldPos = vec3() local LocalAdjPos = vec3()
ThisNPC:NarrationNow("$$FleetFootSummon")
for i = 1, MinionCount, 1 do LocalAdjPos = vec3(math.random(-500, 500), math.random(-500, 500), 0) WorldPos = Math_LocalToWorld(ThisNPC:GetDir(), ThisNPC:GetPos(), LocalAdjPos) ThisNPC:SummonNow( NPC_620001.MinionId, WorldPos) end end
function NPC_620001:OnVictory( ) this:SetUserData( 1, 0 ) this:SetUserData( 2, 0 ) end
